Towns

A

Atmos

Atmos is a tiny fairy mushroom village near [the swamp].

D

Darkwell

A small village east of Oceana between The Glowing Forest and [the swamp] on the edge of dying lake. Darkwell is a front for a slaver ring.

The Tipsy Ant (Tavern/Inn) - large red roofed building in the middle of town.
